About Me

Graduate Student  
University of California Santa Cruz   2016 – Present.
University of Pune 2012 – 2016.

I am a graduate student in the Computer Science department at University of California Santa Cruz. I joined the Storage Systems Research Center in Spring 2017. My research interests lie in storage systems, operating systems and distributed systems.
